page.title: 12CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content:
{THE DRAMA CLUB The Drama Club puts on two plays a year.The most recent ones have been Bedroom Farce and The Hollow.Those who take part and those who watch get a great deal of enjoyment from them.Many members of the local community combine their talents in acting,lighting, producing,etc.to give a very worthwhile and polished performance.
{THE YOUTH CLUB The Youth Club meet weekly and it is intended for young people to get together and enjoy themselves.Several activities take place including table_tennis and snooker.Discos are held for fun and to raise money to keep the club going.Outings are arranged and recently they have been to the skating rink and Alton Towers. Like many of the village clubs and
